data.text: @Binkuwa Haha, I'm probably going to pass 🥲

@GazalaAnver But it says this medicine (සුවධරණිය) helps to booster immunity, right? Not as an alternative to vaccines, right?

But yeah, I found it annoyed when I got this one. But I drank made few drinks anyways. It is super sour!
@SirRianna Ayurveda is traditional medicine in Sri Lanka, but of course, as a third world country, this is a real problem, although they've done a decent job with the vaccination drive I believe.

@GazalaAnver Ayurvedic Department of Health....?
Sounds desperate.... I guess the government can't afford to buy vaccines or other real medicines....🤔😕🤦‍♀️ https://t.co/5XJg6jmTEU
